Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: OASIS EARTH
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey with a crew of astronauts as they experience the Earth's beauty from 233km above it.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The moon is our nearest neighbour in space and the keeper of some of our oldest secrets. It is also our cosmic stepping stone to a future among the planets.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Thanks to a fleet of advanced spacecraft orbiting around and even landing on the surface of Mars, a new portrait of this red planet is emerging. Mars is teetering on the border between a living and a dead world.

Clip.Title: OASIS EARTH

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Valle Isarco to Val Senales
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Valle Isarco to Val Senales, fly over the valleys of Alto Adige with its lakes, villages and flowered balconys.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Valle Aurina to Alpe di Siusi
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Valle Aurina to Alpe di Siusi we continue our journey along the route to the Glacier of Similaun, where Vtzi was discovered.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: OASIS EARTH
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey with a crew of astronauts as they experience the Earth's beauty from 233km above it.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: No time to rest as The Bionic Vet puts all of his surgical and engineering skills into an operation for puppy Jolly, while battling exhaustion.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Australia is famously known as "The Great South Land". And it's indeed her southern seas which most define her. The south coast encompasses 5 States and stretches thousands of miles.

Clip.Title: THE BIG BLUE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Watch as cameras capture what happens when the Blue Whale, the planet's largest living creature, has a feeding frenzy off the coast of southern Australia.

Clip.Title: TAIJI AND BROOME: WEATHERING THE WHALING CONTROVERSY
Clip.Episode: Taiji and Broome: Weathering the Whaling Controversy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Taiji, a town in Japan, and Broome, a town in Australia, were sister city for over 30 years. However, after Taiji became the focus of protests by anti-whaling groups worldwide, Broome was hit with severe criticism as well. The conflicting emotions and anguish felt by the people of Taiji and Broome are revealed here.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he takes you behind the scenes to examine the treasures, secret symbols, and coded messages that you can find at the Smithsonian. With the help of curators and other experts, we unlock some of the Smithsonian's most compelling mysteries.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he goes behind the scenes to the Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute in Panama to track sloths; search the Panama Canal for clues to the creation of the Panamanian Isthmus; and rise sixteen stories atop the rainforest in a construction crane to do bug research.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In "Live Free or Die Hard," the fourth chapter in the high-octane action franchise, a mastermind cyber-criminal holds America hostage by wreaking havoc via the Internet. It's a great thriller, but could this imagined scenario ever happen in real life?

Clip.Title: THE ORIGINS OF OZ
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of Dorothy's adventures in Oz have been seen and read by millions. Now learn the true story of the man behind the curtain, author L. Frank Baum.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he takes you behind the scenes to examine the treasures, secret symbols, and coded messages that you can find at the Smithsonian. With the help of curators and other experts, we unlock some of the Smithsonian's most compelling mysteries.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he goes behind the scenes to the Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute in Panama to track sloths; search the Panama Canal for clues to the creation of the Panamanian Isthmus; and rise sixteen stories atop the rainforest in a construction crane to do bug research.
